answers.answer: 23 for me due aug 4th
65 days. Due September 15. She wont stop kicking my pelvic bone either :(
I'm due Aug. 27 but may be induced on Aug. 20 due to high blood pressure and a fear of developing preeclampsia. Can't wait to meet my daughter!
I have 6 days :) I'm due on 23rd but my c section is on the 18th, next Friday ! I can't wait :D
6 days until my due date! Hopefully he comes between now and then.
Congrats!!!! Im due Aug.22 with my first boy and my birthday is also Aug.22 so welcome to the 22nd club

My guess date is October 16 th.  But because my daughter was so huge and still a little early, my midwife doesn't want me to go past my due date by much. We'll probably schedule an induction for the seventeenth or eighteenth just in case, depending on how big we're measuring.

I cant wait to meet my daughter! Not only is she killing my pelvic bone, shes also kicking my ribs so hard that they feel like they're cracking or breaking. Shes also measuring a week further along than she is.
I'm a week overdue but I've been losing my mucus plug all day long so maybe I won't have to be induced Tuesday
I have 18 days due on July 30th. Currently trying to get her to come on out on the week of the 21st lol bouncing on my birthing ball now. Maybe sex later and a walk tomorrow
I had mine scheduled for the 23rd and he decided to come out this morning. :)

Thats exciting! Maybe your little one will come before or on tuesday congrats! And enjoy him or her at this stage because he or she will be a kid in no time my son turns 6 on the 25th. Cant wait for my daughter to come out.
18 days due July 30th I cannot wait to hold my baby girl.
You guys are so lucky, i wish i was having another july baby, but a month after my son turns 6 *july 25th* my daughter will be here *aug 22nd*
Due aug 20th 39 more days
July 24th hopefully sooner

I hope he comes before Tuesday lol I'd really rather not be induced..I've literally tried everything to go in labor lol I guess sex with the hubby worked yesterday because I've been losing my plug since 11 last night I lost more Today but not the whole thing

My due date is aug 2nd but having another csection so my lil man will be here July 28th rather he likes it or not if he don't come sooner (: so I have 15 days left and these 15 days are dragging lmao ! Good luck on your csection tho . My pelvic bone is the same way but it's also tilted .
August 16th...a boy =) I'm a ftm

A tilted pelvic bone sounds like it hurts ouchy, these 41 days are draging along at least you only have 15 days left, and ftm thats exciting! All i can tell you is enjoy this stage because before you know it he will be 6 and getting into mischif lol, like my little boy whos six lol :)

question: Im due on the 28th of aug but i am having a c section on the 22nd. *i have a really small pelvic bone the baby cannot pass through, and my first born was an emergency c section because of it, so my ob doesnt want to put my daughter at risk.* so i have 41 days to go! How about you??
title: how many weeks/ days do you ladies have?
